translations: 拾扇贝；使成扇形（scallop 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Note the clear vacuoles in the colloid next to the epithelium where the increased activity of the epithelium to produce increased thyroid hormone has led to scalloping out of the colloid.
sentences.translation: 临近上皮细胞的胶质内可见清晰空泡，此处上皮组织细胞活跃，甲状腺激素分泌增多，形成扇形的胶质边缘。
